GeneDef.label: mild cell stability
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene need more metabolic energy to stay alive, in exchange for an increase in stability of their cell-replication machinery.

GeneDef.label: major cell stability
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene need more metabolic energy to stay alive, in exchange for a large increase in stability of their cell-replication machinery.

GeneDef.label: extreme cell stability
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene need more metabolic energy to stay alive, in exchange for an extremely large increase in stability of their cell-replication machinery.
